entry.title: 2x2 Foot LED T-Bar Panel Light, 40W, 5000K, White, 140-watt equivalent, Dimmable Drop Ceiling lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Panels
Price: 136.17 - 272.30 (2 variants)

In contrast with lighting solutions that only contain a single bulb, a LED panel light consists of a combination of LEDs that distributes light evenly and smoothly over a wide area giving you the proper illumination you need. This smooth distribution of lighting is one of the key factors of drop ceiling LED lights. This 2x2 40W LED light can replace a 140-watt fluorescent panel while providing you with a bright lumen output of 4800 lumens. These 40W 2X2 LED panels can save you up to 75% on utility bills. LED Panel lights are designed to replace traditional fluorescent ceiling lights. Also known as basement ceiling lights due to their versatile use in different business and commercial spaces. With all these strong points, you will be right to believe that led flat panel light will undoubtedly be the way to your brighter future.
